displayedName.zh: 批量修改 oto 参数

description.en: Edit the parameters of multiple entries in UTAU oto.ini at once.
description.zh: 一次性修改 UTAU oto.ini 中多个条目的参数。

list.name: selector
list.label: Entries to edit
list.description: Select the entries to edit. Leave blank to edit all entries.

list.name: expression
list.label: Expression
list.description: Expression to calculate the new value. Parameter placeholders such as "${Offset}", "${Overlap} are available in the calculation.
